title: The archimedean ordered field of real numbers

blocks.name: reofld
blocks.content: The real numbers form an ordered field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm reofld() {
  |- wcel(crefld, cofld)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(crefld, cofld), wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, corng))
  mpbir3an(wcel(crefld, corng), wcel(crefld, crg), wcel(crefld, cogrp), wral(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cr, wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(crefld, cogrp), wcel(crefld, cgrp), wcel(crefld, comnd))
  mpbir3an(wcel(crefld, comnd), wcel(crefld, cmnd), wcel(crefld, ctos), wral(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cr, wral(hs2, cr, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))))))))
  ax-mp(wcel(crefld, cmnd), wcel(crefld, cgrp))
  ax-mp(wcel(crefld, cgrp), wcel(crefld, crg))
  mp2b(wcel(crefld, crg), wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  refld()
  simplbi(wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, ccrg))
  isfld(crefld)
  drngring(crefld)
  ringgrp(crefld)
  grpmnd(crefld)
  retos()
  rgen3(hs0, hs1, hs2, cr, cr, cr, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))))
  3impa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(hs2), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))))
  3anassrs(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))))
  leadd1dd(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))
  simpr1(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))
  simpr2(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))
  simpr3(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))
  isomnd(hs0, hs1, hs2, crefld, cr, cle, caddc)
  replusg()
  isogrp(crefld)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cr, wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)))))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1))))
  an4s(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1))))
  mulge0(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  isorng(hs0, hs1, crefld, cr, nat0, cle, cmul)
  rebase()
  re0g()
  remulr()
  rele2()
  isofld(crefld)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs2.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs2.c(crefld)
}

thm reofld() {
  ‚ä¢ RRfld ‚àà oField
} = {
  mpbir2an(RRfld ‚àà oField, RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà oRing)
  mpbir3an(RRfld ‚àà oRing, RRfld ‚àà Ring, RRfld ‚àà oGrp, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]hs1)‚Üí 0[‚â§](hs0[√ó]hs1)))))
  mpbir2an(RRfld ‚àà oGrp, RRfld ‚àà Grp, RRfld ‚àà oMnd)
  mpbir3an(RRfld ‚àà oMnd, RRfld ‚àà Mnd, RRfld ‚àà Toset, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(hs0[‚â§]hs1 ‚Üí(hs0[+]hs2)[‚â§](hs1[+]hs2))))))
  ax-mp(RRfld ‚àà Mnd, RRfld ‚àà Grp)
  ax-mp(RRfld ‚àà Grp, RRfld ‚àà Ring)
  mp2b(RRfld ‚àà Ring, RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  refld()
  simplbi(RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà DivRing, RRfld ‚àà CRing)
  isfld(crefld)
  drngring(crefld)
  ringgrp(crefld)
  grpmnd(crefld)
  retos()
  rgen3(hs0, hs1, hs2, cr, cr, cr, (hs0[‚â§]hs1 ‚Üí(hs0[+]hs2)[‚â§](hs1[+]hs2)))
  3impa(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (hs0[‚â§]hs1 ‚Üí(hs0[+]hs2)[‚â§](hs1[+]hs2)))
  ex(((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù), hs0[‚â§]hs1, (hs0[+]hs2)[‚â§](hs1[+]hs2))
  3anassrs(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs0[‚â§]hs1, (hs0[+]hs2)[‚â§](hs1[+]hs2))
  leadd1dd(hs0, hs2, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[‚â§]hs1)))
  simpl(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[‚â§]hs1))
  simpr1(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs0[‚â§]hs1)
  simpr2(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs0[‚â§]hs1)
  simpr3(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs0[‚â§]hs1)
  isomnd(hs0, hs1, hs2, crefld, cr, cle, caddc)
  replusg()
  isogrp(crefld)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cr, ((0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]hs1)‚Üí 0[‚â§](hs0[√ó]hs1)))
  ex((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]hs1), 0[‚â§](hs0[√ó]hs1))
  an4s(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, 0[‚â§]hs0, 0[‚â§]hs1, 0[‚â§](hs0[√ó]hs1))
  mulge0(hs0, hs1)
  isorng(hs0, hs1, crefld, cr, nat0, cle, cmul)
  rebase()
  re0g()
  remulr()
  rele2()
  isofld(crefld)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs2.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs2.c(crefld)
}

blocks.name: nn0omnd
blocks.content: The nonnegative integers form an ordered monoid. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0omnd() {
  |- wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), comnd)
} = {
  eqeltrri(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), comnd, co(crefld, cress, cn0))
  mp2an(wcel(co(crefld, cress, cn0), comnd), wcel(crefld, comnd), wcel(co(crefld, cress, cn0), cmnd))
  ax-mp(wcel(crefld, comnd), wcel(crefld, cofld))
  reofld()
  3syl(wcel(crefld, cofld), wcel(crefld, comnd), wcel(crefld, corng), wcel(crefld, cogrp))
  simprbi(wcel(crefld, cofld), wcel(crefld, corng), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  isofld(crefld)
  orngogrp(crefld)
  simprbi(wcel(crefld, cogrp), wcel(crefld, comnd), wcel(crefld, cgrp))
  isogrp(crefld)
  eqeltri(co(crefld, cress, cn0), cmnd, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0))
  eqtri(co(crefld, cress, cn0), co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cn0))
  oveq1i(crefld, cress, cn0, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cn0), co(ccnfld, cress, cn0)), wcel(cr, universe), wss(cn0, cr))
  reex()
  nn0ssre()
  ressabs(cr, universe, cn0, ccnfld)
  ax-mp(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), cmnd), wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)))
  nn0subm()
  submmnd(cn0, ccnfld, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0))
  submomnd(crefld, cn0)
}

thm nn0omnd() {
  ‚ä¢ (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0)‚àà oMnd
} = {
  eqeltrri((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0), comnd, (RRfld[|`s]‚Ñï0))
  mp2an((RRfld[|`s]‚Ñï0)‚àà oMnd, RRfld ‚àà oMnd, (RRfld[|`s]‚Ñï0)‚àà Mnd)
  ax-mp(RRfld ‚àà oMnd, RRfld ‚àà oField)
  reofld()
  3syl(RRfld ‚àà oField, RRfld ‚àà oMnd, RRfld ‚àà oRing, RRfld ‚àà oGrp)
  simprbi(RRfld ‚àà oField, RRfld ‚àà oRing, RRfld ‚àà Field)
  isofld(crefld)
  orngogrp(crefld)
  simprbi(RRfld ‚àà oGrp, RRfld ‚àà oMnd, RRfld ‚àà Grp)
  isogrp(crefld)
  eqeltri((RRfld[|`s]‚Ñï0), cmnd, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0))
  eqtri((RRfld[|`s]‚Ñï0), (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0), ((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)[|`s]‚Ñï0))
  oveq1i(crefld, cress, cn0, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  df-refld()
  mp2an(((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)[|`s]‚Ñï0)=(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0), ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñï0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  reex()
  nn0ssre()
  ressabs(cr, universe, cn0, ccnfld)
  ax-mp((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0)‚àà Mnd, ‚Ñï0 ‚àà(SubMnd ` CCfld))
  nn0subm()
  submmnd(cn0, ccnfld, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñï0))
  submomnd(crefld, cn0)
}

blocks.name: rearchi
blocks.content: The field of the real numbers is Archimedean. See also ~ arch . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm rearchi() {
  |- wcel(crefld, carchi)
} = {
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, wcel(crefld, carchi), wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(crefld, carchi), wral(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(crefld, cofld))
  reofld()
  isarchiofld(hs0, hs1, crefld, cr, clt, cfv(czrh, crefld))
  rebase()
  relt()
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))))
  arch(hs1, cv(hs0))
  rexbiia(hs1, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  nnz(cv(hs1))
  breq2d(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1), co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat1), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1)), wcel(crefld, crg))
  mp2b(wcel(crefld, crg), wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  refld()
  simplbi(wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, ccrg))
  isfld(crefld)
  drngring(crefld)
  zrhmulg(crefld, cv(hs1), cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1)
  eqid(cfv(czrh, crefld))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, crefld))
  re1r()
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1), co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  remulg(cv(hs1), nat1)
  mulid1d(cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  zcn(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(czrh, crefld))
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm rearchi() {
  ‚ä¢ RRfld ‚àà Archi
} = {
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, RRfld ‚àà Archi, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs0[<]((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1)))
  ax-mp((RRfld ‚àà Archi ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs0[<]((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1)))), RRfld ‚àà oField)
  reofld()
  isarchiofld(hs0, hs1, crefld, cr, clt, (ZRHom ` RRfld))
  rebase()
  relt()
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs0[<]((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs0[<]hs1))
  arch(hs1, hs0)
  rexbiia(hs1, cn, hs0[<]((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1), hs0[<]hs1)
  syl(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, (hs0[<]((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1)‚Üî hs0[<]hs1), hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  nnz(hs1)
  breq2d(hs0, clt, ((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1), hs1, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  3eqtrd(((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1), hs1, (hs1[(.g ` RRfld)]1), (hs1[√ó]1), hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  mpan(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ((ZRHom ` RRfld)` hs1)=(hs1[(.g ` RRfld)]1), RRfld ‚àà Ring)
  mp2b(RRfld ‚àà Ring, RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  refld()
  simplbi(RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà DivRing, RRfld ‚àà CRing)
  isfld(crefld)
  drngring(crefld)
  zrhmulg(crefld, hs1, (ZRHom ` RRfld), (.g ` RRfld), nat1)
  eqid((ZRHom ` RRfld))
  eqid((.g ` RRfld))
  re1r()
  mpan2(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (hs1[(.g ` RRfld)]1)=(hs1[√ó]1), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  1re()
  remulg(hs1, nat1)
  mulid1d(hs1, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  zcn(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c((ZRHom ` RRfld))
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: nn0archi
blocks.content: The monoid of the nonnegative integers is Archimedean. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0archi() {
  |- wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), carchi)
} = {
  eqeltrri(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), carchi, co(crefld, cress, cn0))
  eqtri(co(crefld, cress, cn0), co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cn0))
  oveq1i(crefld, cress, cn0, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cn0), co(ccnfld, cress, cn0)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wss(cn0, cr))
  ressabs(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld), cn0, ccnfld)
  mp2an(wcel(co(crefld, cress, cn0), carchi), wa(wcel(crefld, ctos), wcel(crefld, carchi)), wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, crefld)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(crefld, ctos), wcel(crefld, carchi))
  retos()
  rearchi()
  mpbir2an(wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, crefld)), wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)), wss(cn0, cr))
  nn0subm()
  nn0ssre()
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, crefld)), wa(wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)), wss(cn0, cr))), wcel(cr, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)))
  mp2b(wcel(cr, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  resubdrg()
  subrgsubg(cr, ccnfld)
  subgsubm(cr, ccnfld)
  subsubm(cr, ccnfld, cn0, crefld)
  df-refld()
  submarchi(crefld, cn0)
}

  mp2b(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubMnd ` CCfld), ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld))
